name: Pals Collection
description: A set of NFT companions in the Cash Capy app. Each Pal has unique traits, rarity levels, and daily earning potential based on upkeep and loyalty.

upkeep.description: Players maintain Pals by feeding, playing, and interacting with them. Better upkeep improves dividend consistency and growth.
effects: Neglected Pals may reduce their daily payout

loyalty.description: The longer a Pal stays with you and is cared for, the more loyalty it builds.

nfts.name: Pyronix
nfts.description: Pyronix, the Blazecrest Pal, was born from a spark of the sun itself. Its fiery feathers shimmer like molten embers, and its piercing blue eyes blaze with courage. Known to bond only with the bravest, Pyronix’s loyalty ignites unmatched rewards.

notes: This is a living collection. New Pals will be added over time, each with distinct designs, personalities, and reward mechanics.
